EmailTemplate.subject: Find out What BendixKing’s AeroVue™ can Do for You in the Demonstration Flight!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]> <[[http://www.bendixking.com/Products/Integrated-Flight-Decks/BendixKing-AeroVue]]>
King Air B200 Owners/Operators,
BendixKing’s AeroVue™ is a complete cockpit upgrade that brings the same quality and sophistication of Honeywell’s Primus Epic and Primus Apex integrated flight decks to King Air B200 customers.
Schedule a demonstration flight in our King Air B200 and find out how BendixKing’s AeroVue™ can improve your flight experience!
SCHEDULE A DEMO FLIGHT <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/BK_B200Demo.html]]>
AeroVue’s three high-resolution 12-inch liquid crystal displays with Honeywell's SmartView™ Synthetic Vision System software is offered as standard for early buyers.
The software enhances:
- Pilot safety and alertness, when flying and landing at night, in bad weather, or at unfamiliar airports
- The track-based flight management system and heads-up display symbols on the primary display
- A cursor control device mounted on the center console that eliminates the need for pilots to reach out to the instrument panel
Experience business jet technology and functionality in a general aviation cockpit.
